name: Klondike Solitaire - Classic
description:
Traditional no-nonsense Klondike solitaire with the MmpApps standard card game interface.
There are four version of this classic game, all are free-to-play with no in-app purchases.

Play 3-Card cycling through the deck three cards at-a-time.

Play 1-Card with one pass through the deck one card at-a-time.

The cache versions have a single cache spot where you can store a card increasing the strategic possibilities.
